H3.text: where is mt st helens located. Washington

A4.text: Mount St. Helens is located in Skamania County, Washington, in the Pacific Northwest region of the United States.

A5.text: Mount St. Helens lies 52 miles (83 km) northeast of Portland, Oregon, and 98 miles (158 km) south of Seattle.
